assetRequirements.purpose: main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Paris in autumn
assetRequirements.visual_style: artistic and warm, featuring autumn colors
assetRequirements.content_context: A scenic view of Paris showcasing yellow leaves, the Eiffel Tower in fog, and a cozy café atmosphere.

assetRequirements.purpose: highlight specific attractions in Paris during autumn
assetRequirements.visual_style: vibrant and engaging, focusing on cultural landmarks
assetRequirements.content_context: Images of famous Parisian landmarks like the Eiffel Tower and Montmartre during the autumn season.

usageInstructions.placement: Place according to campaign layout requirements
usageInstructions.context: Use in context of: Париж осенью: романтика и уют по лучшим ценам!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
usageInstructions.responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
usageInstructions.accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected These icons will be used to highlight special offers and discounts, guiding users through the promotional aspects of the campaign.". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
usageInstructions.fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
